website_summaries.verdict: Boasting a folding design, dual canopies, and a highly attractive price tag, this feature-packed bassinet offers great value for money.
pros: Ultra lightweight with compact folded dimensions
Features 2 breathable canopies to keep pests out
Safe for babies weighing up to 25 pounds
Comes with a handy bottom storage basket
Can be rocked to soothe little ones
cons: Doesn’t come with a travel bag

customer_reviews.title: I found sheets!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! I know a lot of comments on previous reviews mentioned that the pad didn't come with sheets. Because my last baby died of SIDS while in a bassinet that has make shift sheets on it, tight fitting sheets were a must. Sheets for the Halo Bassinest work perfectly, they are tight fitting and they don't make the pad curl up. If you don't like the color choices for the sheets at baby r us, etsy.com has great choices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I won’t go into detail on the actual bassinet - see the other well written reviews. However, if you have not found information on what sheets fit, after much trial and error I found the Halo bassinet sheets to work beautifully. DO NOT buy the “recommended with this product” waterproof sheets because they will fold your mattress in half and it will be unusable. I hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer in VA

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great value
customer_reviews.text: Okay so don't look anywhere else for a bassinet, seriously. This thing DOES hold up to 25 pounds (picture provided) and is sooo sturdy. It took my husband 30 seconds to set it up and break it down. So durable and the mattress is a great thickness! The add on sheet was only 3$ and is so soft and you actually have a good amount of room to place baby in. Seriously get it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my dog lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 20 yr old chihuahua because he has dementia and gets lost if he wakes up in middle of the night. This is perfect and i can keep it right beside me and not worry about him falling off the bed
customer_reviews.author: bbbritty

customer_reviews.title: I found the CORRECT sheets!!!
customer_reviews.text: After trying 3 diff ones the ONLY one that works is American Baby Company 2 Pack 100% Natural Cotton Value Jersey Knit Fitted Bassinet Sheet, Celery, Soft Breathable, for Boys and Girls  Halo and Nodnal do NOT fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aarti Patel

customer_reviews.title: This has great mileage
customer_reviews.text: We used this until my son was about 9 months old and too big for it, and then I gave it to someone who needed a bassinet and she got just as much mileage out of it as well. My cats really made an effort to destroy this, but this little bassinet just keeps chugging along! The mesh sides are highly susceptible to cat claws, but that really only effects how it looks. This is a great buy for the price, and it's also very lightweight and was easy for us to carry up and downstairs, as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet if you have a cat
customer_reviews.text: I got this bassinet specifically because I have a cat. We weren't sure how Nimbus would treat the baby and we loved that a zippered cover would protect her when we weren't able to watch. I have a few small complaints: the zipper is a little annoying to zip unless you have tiny fingers, the zipper is a little loud to zip up when you're trying to get the baby to sleep, and the bassinet is a bit low to the ground if you care about back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Used with newborn. It is lightweight but sturdy, easy to move and slides well on carpet to move to and from bed. It is low so if you have a tall bed you will have to lean over as the height does not adjust. Perfect for traveling and folds up easily. Love the storage net underneath which is perfect for extra diapers, blankets, etc. I do not care for the canopy part on top if using strictly as a bassinet as it does not detach. It feels somewhat in the way. I also found the sides hard to see through at night compared to the Halo bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Portable Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: No dislike on this products, I purchased it because it is portable, easy to fold and unfold, and we can take it wherever we want, it fits perfectly in the car. I like that the cover closes completely so if you're outside you can close the top to keep the insects out and can still see the baby. This bassinet is perfect. It was delivered promptly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melaynie

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: This things snaps together quickly and folds for easy travel. The breathable mesh and allows air flow in the bassinet. YOU DON'T NEED TO PURCHASE A MATTRESS. Safe sleep guidelines put out by the AAP recommend that bassinet mattresses be no thicker than 1.5 inches and firm. Your baby does not need a plush bassinet mattress. However, you will need to buy sheets. I'd suggest searching for oval pocket sheets. Pretty much any sheet branded as fitting the Halo bassinet will also fit this bassinet. Pocket sheets are nice because there's no risk of the sheet coming loose in the middle of the night and posing a suffocation hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great bassinet for newborns. Fits perfectly next to my bed and the canopy does good job protecting my baby. I have 2 cats that shouldn’t bother my baby but the net makes me feel safer if I need to step away for a bit to use the bathroom or something. Cute color and you can store couple things underneath it like diapers and wipes. Great way to be next to my baby until she is ready to move to her crib. I did buy a cushion to Kate the bassinet little more comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Loved the zip canopy feature and basket underneath. However, this bassinet was a major safety hazard. Newborn baby would slide around and be turned all sorts of ways, as mattress didn't lay flat enough. Had to return. Mesh also doesn't go all the way to bottom so what's the point? Can't recommend , not safe, especially at night.
customer_reviews.author: AnonyUser

customer_reviews.title: Super useful, super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this thing!! My 2.5 year old is ~35-36 inches tall and can nearly lay down in it. So you know it'll be useful for a while! Even better is the mesh canopy that can be fully zipped up. I'm having a summer baby and it is super important that I'm able to keep the mosquitos off baby if we use this in the backyard (which will probably be a lot since I have a 2 and 7 year old). Additionally, it'll keep our kitties from cuddling baby while he sleeps. A win-win!!
customer_reviews.author: Alina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable product. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Super easy to set up. Looks great. Lightweight and easy to move from room to room. The double canopy is sturdy and the zip closure is awesome this is for my fourth baby and being that I have 5 cats safety is of upmost importance as my cats love to cuddle with my bigger kids I was worried about the new baby but the double canopy holds my cats weight without collapsing. Overall an excellent product I’m very satisfied with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bassinet. Our baby loves it too. I especially like the zippered hood that is built into the bed. Along with being sturdy, the hood is strong and able to have air flow through and around the entire bassinet. This design gives baby fresh air, we can see the baby through the screen material of the sides and hood of the bassinet. I must also mansion, our inquisitive and loving cats, cannot climb in the bed with the baby. The sturdiness of the fear adds to the quality of the product. We could not be happier. The mattress is adequately firm. Moreover, this product exceeds our expectations and has made us extremely happy consumers!
customer_reviews.author: Kady, the Konsumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have medical devices that won’t work with crib bars.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My son had a catheter at 3 weeks and we needed a bassinet sleeper that we could use with it. We cut a hole in the mesh and used the lower basket to support drainage tube. It was perfect! The mesh held together and did not run or thread apart after cutting. He is done with catheter and we taped it back up perfectly. He sleeps right next to us and now that the weather is warming up, we will move this right to our covered deck and he will have full protection frombugs and debris. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for twins!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my twins, and I love them! My babies are four months old now, and we still use them. Considering they don't sleep stretched out, there is still plenty of room in the bassinet. Pros: Sturdy. The bassinet is not going to collapse. If a curious toddler climbs in, they will not compromise the integrity of the bed. Promise. Portable. I can fold it up and take it almost anywhere. Safe. Breathable mesh sides and locking folding hinges. The cover is great to keep mosquitos away! Cons: The mattress could have more umph to it. But not a deal breaker in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Leahbadeah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, love the color
customer_reviews.text: Great item, quick delivery! Upon opening, I was prepared to take 10-25 minutes to assemble it. However, you can pull it straight out of the box and just attach the legs and you're good to go!! Seems to be extremely sturdy. We bought this because of tbe canopy, as we have three cats who love comfort and heights! The top canopy does not come off, at least not to my knowledge! But there are straps with snaps to secure it away when not in use. Looking forward to using it when baby arrives! For those looking at sheets, the HALO bassinet sheets apparently fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: мα∂αℓуии

customer_reviews.title: Up to 5months old
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay basinet. I really liked the idea of the zipper part but its not as comfortable as it looks. My baby would wake up every time i would try to zip up the parts and now that he is 5months olds he needs a bigger bassinet or bed. I was hoping i would be able to use this up to 1 yr old but nope. I dont know if i want to recommend this. I would say shop around for better options.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora A

customer_reviews.title: Mom of 5 review
customer_reviews.text: This is great! As an experienced mom of 5 and I wanted new baby in our room but a crib won't fit, I personally think bassinets are a waste of money but this was such an awesome find. Great price, wonderful see through mesh siding ...The suggestions for mattress and sheets really helped in the 'questions' section. Do not just go with Amazon recommendations. So light weight. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Hard to zip the top
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice looking bassinet. However, our infant has barely used it, but not a problem with the bassinet. We purchased it to have a place for our infant to sleep while camping. We have chosen not to do much camping this summer due to the COVID-19 outbreak, so unfortunately, it will not get much use. Big downside of this bassinet: super tough to zipper up the top. I mean SUPER tough. You have to squeeze the sides super hard to get it to give a little. It would not be possible to put a sleepy baby in, try to close the top, and not cause so much commotion that the baby wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathanandmiranda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bassinet! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I really love this bassinet. I have 2 kitties and a dog that wanted to sleep with baby and zipping it up kept them out and baby safe. As he grows though the zipping parts do tend to want to fall into the bassinet, not enough to pose a risk to baby but enough that when taking him out I have to maneuver around them. I love that standard bassinet sheets fit it. Overall, it has been great and I cant wait for our camping trip to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Cute but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this when I received it today but it is very bulky since the canopy cannot be taken off completely. The canopy can be held down with snaps but still covers a little the part where the baby sleeps. It is not quick folding and all 4 side ‘circular’ parts have to be bent in so that it can be folded. This requires some pressure(also to open). The bottom backet area is nice and can be hung anywhere on the bottom legs. This would be good for someone in the summer who spends a lot of time outside. Mattress isnt to thick or thin
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute and pretty but comfort and safety are null
customer_reviews.text: Its not safe for a baby that moves in their sleep. The bottom part of the bassinet where the baby sleeps is solid not mess. So if your child gets up next to the side with their face and is not able to breathe it could have horrible results. The support of the mattress is cardboard then a thin pad on top of it. Husband and I were not impressed. Yes it folds up nicely. Yes its cute and pretty. But childs safety is more important as well as comfort. Maybe others have had a better experience with the product than we did. But perhaps the designers should make it mesh throughout the sleeping side areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Using again on my second baby, so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Very stable but lightweight and foldable if you need to travel with it, move it from room to room, or just want to safely bring baby outside. Unlike some of the more expensive "smart" bassinets, there's no sides that flop down over time and wear down. The side mesh is transparent enough to watch the rise & fall of baby's chest, or for them to see you through. I loved this with my first, and now that we're reusing it with my second I love it just as much
customer_reviews.author: Elan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our newborn son so he could sleep in our room after being born. This is small enough to manuever around and it folds so we can take it places when we travel too. Very easy to set up and take down and folds nicely. Our son sleeps well in it and it also covers up for privacy too if needed. This was a great product at a decent price. Very durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: It feels sturdy and I love how easily it folds up and ...
customer_reviews.text: My newborn has really slept well in this bassinet. It feels sturdy and I love how easily it folds up and transports. I highly recommend purchasing a bassinet mattress for this product. The pad it comes with is definitely not thick enough. However, the oval foam bassinet mattress by "Play kids" fits perfect! I was so happy that the additional mattress was recommended because other wise I would not be so happy with this bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little portable bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to accommodate my visiting grandson. I was pleasantly surprised at the sturdiness of this product for the price. I’m sure it’s going to work great for him. What I did not care for is the zippered cover not opening big enough. Not sure if this is a defect or if that is the way it is but going to try it with baby to see if it complicates putting him inside or taking him out. Update: The bassinet worked great, got the job done. Got baby in and out of bassinet with no problem relative to mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Robles

customer_reviews.title: You don't need to spend a lot of money to have a great bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bassinet! It's sturdy, portable, stylish and will protect our son from our curious little kitten. I love that I can take it anywhere and it folds easily. The mattress/pad that comes with the bassinet is fine, but I still chose to buy the Big Oshi mattress, but I wouldn't say it's necessary. We also got the Brolex bassinet sheets to go with it. I think our son will be able to sleep in this bassinet for many months until he transitions to his crib.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Poor matress pad, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's firm, secure and easy to fold, but the matress pad is thin and uncomfortable, I also purchased the mattress cover, but it's still very thin, and when the baby made some small movements, the pad made noise to wake my baby up. it says I shouldn't put any other pad inside, I tried, and the baby strongly refused to sleep in it.... In total I only use it once, now it sits in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle 客户

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite purchases after baby. Didnt take up a bunch of room in our bedroom, i love the mesh sides so you can see baby while they sleep. the under storage is great for nighttime changes or extra clothes. Easy to assemble and convenient foldable feature makes traveling or storage easy. I wish i would have found it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Johnson

customer_reviews.title: If you travel, this bassinet is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet! Even though my baby has a pack and play, this one stays next to my bed at night where my baby sleeps. We take this with us when we're travelling so that our baby has a consistent place to sleep. It is great! Easy to take around and just the right size. I just wish it came with a bag so that it wouldn't get dirty while were travelling with it. Overall it is sturdy, provides airflow for my baby, light enough to bring around with us. If you travel, this bassinet is great!
customer_reviews.author: funkymonkey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but mattress isn’t really a mattress but a thin cushion
customer_reviews.text: Eh so I got this bc I have cats and weren’t sure if they’d try to get in the bassinet once I brought the newborn home. They don’t, but happy to hve had this for peace of mind. Nice bassinet, but the mattress is terrible - basically not really a mattress it comes with. And the only one I could find to fit is just barely average too. I would get a better bassinet that had a quality mattress if I were to repurchase. But the frame of this thing is sturdy and well made - serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Keeps the cat out!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to keep the cat away from the baby when we sleep. It works great. Really good quality at a reasonable price. My one complaint is the mattress it comes with is too flimsy to put a fitted sheet on without it folding up. We solved this by getting the big oshie 16”x32”x2” mattress to put in instead and that fixed the problem. I would highly recommend getting this mattress with the bassinet. The bassinet plus better mattress plus fitted sheets cost us about $100 all together which is still pretty reasonable for a quality bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: grant Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Back breaker!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress for the baby is very low - lower than your bed. Kills your back getting baby in and out of this, horrible ergonomics. Its also difficult to zip up as the zipper goes past a metal bar and then is difficult to get back up past that bar again, each time is a struggle. We bought it to keep the cats off baby at night, but ended up keeping it open and locking the cats out of the room - then after a week we couldn’t stand it any longer and bought a halo bassinest.
customer_reviews.author: Super nuggets

customer_reviews.title: Fast deliver, great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my goddaughter, and her parents really enjoy it. Is very handy, fold easily, easy to storage, can be carry all the way through the house with no complications, also love the mosquito nest how is zip and love the fact of no assembling time sings came assembly. The only concern was the pat mattress, wish would be little thicker other than that this is a perfect bassinet for a newborn baby.
customer_reviews.author: garnet

customer_reviews.title: Great little bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backup crib at my mom’s house for when she watched the baby. She’s currently 11 lbs and it’s perfect. This bassinet is affordable and easy to put together. It also has a nice area underneath to our diapers, wipes and other supplies. It’s also super cute. What sold me was the price though, you don’t want to pay a lot for something baby will grow out of in a few short months.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great because it folds, made a little cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the functionality of this item. I'm stationed overseas and space is a HUGE problem. The fact that this can fold up for easy storage was a huge selling point for me. The only thing that's frustrating is the canopy hardly reaches and trying to zip it is a struggle. The material is kind of made of cheap tent material so if I pull to hard to zip it, it will break. I loved the idea of zipper top to try and prevent my cats from jumping in the bassinet with my baby. I'll make it work but the canopy definitely needs a bit of work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have cats
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you have cats! just got it today and the cover will be perfect for keeping my cats out of the baby sleeping area. My cats are big snugglers. The zip top cover will keep the baby safe while she sleeps and keep my cats from shedding all over her. The height goes to right about perfect bedside height, and it is very lightweight and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Ordered a 2nd to keep on my main floor as the other is in our bedroom. Price, easy setup, easy to travel with. I bought the halo pillow case style sheet/cover & it fits perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: h_m_b

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a new mom so buying anything online for my child is a little scary but I love this bassinet. I was looking through hundreds of different ones because I am a new mom and I just wasn't sure which one would be safe for my child or not. I love this one because I can still see my little girl when it's nighttime and it's easier to check on her. Very durable too, I had my husband push on it with some force just to make sure it would be suitable for our baby. I definitely do recommend this for anyone skeptical about buying a bassinet online.
customer_reviews.author: Nikitta René

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee this bassinet. We use this as his regular bed, as well as when we have to travel. My little guy is 3 months old and still sleeps in it. However we did replace the mattress it came with. This gave me such peace of mind when we was first born since we have a cat who is sometimes unpredictable. This bassinet is perfect. And it's cute too!
customer_reviews.author: kansascity

customer_reviews.title: Kept the cats out, cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.text: Bassinet was purchased pre baby because we have cats and I had no idea how they would react. They wound up not being an issue. This bassinet cleans easily, travels well, for us through 5 months. My only complaint is the cover does take up about 4 on either side of the top of the bassinet, which led to some sneaky maneuvering for putting baby down. We didn’t get to use this outside but I’m sure it would be great for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Renczarski

customer_reviews.title: The best in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was easy to assemble and it was a bit hard to fold the sides but for the most part it was simple and for the storage I guess there is a good amount of space. I wouldn’t really know cause my cat sleep on the storage basket lol
customer_reviews.author: Athenas

customer_reviews.title: Very Neat and Great for Newborn Babies
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bassinet to welcome home our princess and Im very pleased with it so far. I was a bit skeptical with how it’d be packaged but honestly it’s very easy to assemble. By the time my husband took it from the box and unfolded it everything was in place. Also happy that it’s canopy styled to keep out unwanted bugs. Overall very good product and neatly put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jeralie Keira Wong-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my daughter-in-law because she has a two year old son who loves being outside and a new born baby girl. This allows her to put the new born inside and zip it up to keep the bugs out and she can see her through the netting. Baby girls has good air circulation but a nice comfy place to sleep. she will be able to use it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Saryaphin

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is super handy and more portable than I thought. We were displaced during hurricane Laura and took this with us when we evacuated. My baby was only 9 days old at the time. We were able to pack this easily. The zippered canopy was nice while we were home to keep the cats out and now since we've left to keep the bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Looks just like the picture, super easy to assemble and just as easy to fold up. I got one of the recommended sheets and it fits perfect- don't think the pad is too thin. Keeps it soft while still firm enough to be safe. Highly recommend for anyone looking for something easily portable or just a space saver like me!
customer_reviews.author: Gryffindor4ble

customer_reviews.title: A MUST if you have CATS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver and sanity saver for me. I can get some sleep at night knowing my baby is safe and I don't have to worry about the cat jumping in the bassinet. It's not that my cat would intentionally hurt him, but because he is not strong enough to push the cat off him. It's in the nature of a cat to snuggle and cuddle. I highly recommend to anyone who owns a cat and has a baby. I was quite impressed by the quality of this bassinet. It is very well made and sturdy. If you have a cat(s), this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: William Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, need mesh all along sides
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for keeping the cats away from baby, only giving 1 star because the sides really should be all mesh down to the bottom for safety. We had to stop using very early because as soon as my little could wiggle she would shimmy to the side of the bassinet and I would find her with her face pressed against the side. Since it's not mesh this is a definite suffocation hazard
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible product for an incredible price. It is strong feeling and seems well made. It's cute. And the best part is the easy of putting it together. It comes completely assembles aside from two leg pieces that you just snap in. You truly can't get easier than that!
customer_reviews.author: Katrin B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute bassinet
customer_reviews.text: My baby will be here next week so she hasn’t tried it yet but it was very easy to put together and it seems pretty sturdy. I was concerned about the mattress because of other reviewers but it seems ok and I bought Halo sheets as recommended by others. It folds up nicely and I will be using this for traveling in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the cover!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about 1 week now with our newborn. He loves it and we love that fact that it’s cat and sister proof for the most part. I sleep much better knowing my blankets or pillows are not going to go on top of him. That the cat is not going to try and snuggle with him. And that sister can’t give him extra blankets! Didn’t realize I would like the top cover so much. Had to add a little bit of ribbon to help pull the zippers up but than that it’s been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Every night
customer_reviews.text: Little man sleeps in it every night! It’s a really good size so there’s room to grow. I wish there were a way to remove the top netting while not in use but I can live with it!
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: bought for my nieces new baby...
customer_reviews.text: The home is small, so this fits great. It fold and unfolds very easy, so they can take the bed with them when they travel. They have 2 cats, so I thought it would be good to close it up at night while the baby is sleeping. It has netting so it will keep bugs out too if they are sitting outside. New mother loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Compton

customer_reviews.title: Loud zipper
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have pet cats, I wanted something I could close to keep my worries away about the cats sleeping on the baby.... well it's not easy to zip and the zipper is super loud when you are trying to place a sleeping baby down and zip it up....haven't been successful - wish I wouldn't have bought it. Would be great if you didn't buy it exclusively for the zip top.
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beside our bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I have a 2.5 year old daughter who is head over heels in love with her new baby brother. She’s got to be constantly loving him or touching him... and walking him up. I love that I can zip this up and take a shower and she can’t get to him. Plus: it’s super light weight and perfect for beside our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Langhorne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little dog who won't sleep alone and has back problems. She loves to go to bed now! It worked out perfectly for us! Its a great piece!
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: hard as a rock, baby won't sleep in bassinet
customer_reviews.text: My baby refused to sleep in this. It's as hard as a rock and he would cry nonstop until we picked him up. We ended up buying a different bassinet that's got much more cushion to it and portable (turns into a backpack, and you can put it in bed with you) and he likes that much better. I must say though that we ended up putting that inside this bassinet so we had more room in bed and it fits perfectly inside this bassinet. I just would have preferred not to have to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Baldinger

customer_reviews.title: Baby is not here yet but set up and look is great
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to set up, like a few minutes tops. Easy to break down and compact to move it to another location. Doc a tot fits in it perfectly snug also!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Grace

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bassinet for the money but my baby would never sleep in it. The pad that came with it might as well have been a prison mattress, and the legs wobbled due to being uneven. Also, I saw some reviews saying that the HALO bassinet sheets fit but I did not find this to be true. The sheet was too small, not that it would have made a difference. The pad also had permanent indentations from being folded and from the legs being packed on top of it. So far this has been a waste.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a secondary bassinet to keep in our living room or travel with. It’s great for the price. It didn’t come with a sheet so that would have been nice, but it’s good and sturdy. I like that it zips up. We’ve taken it outside when we’re sitting on our patio and it keeps bugs away from little one while zipped up but still plenty of breathable mesh so he gets air flow. I like that it can fold for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Whit G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up BUT after 2 weeks of use it’s bending
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to set up and looked amazing UNTIL we brought my son home. We have officially used this for 2 weeks and it’s already bending in the middle. The pad says it holds up to 25 lbs or 3 months and all I can say is FALSE. My son weighs 11 lbs 5 oz (big baby) and it doesn’t seem to hold him at all. Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinelove

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bassinet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is very nice and sturdy, easy to assemble and very sturdy. Folds up easy and only have to put the legs on which snaps together and you can take them back off folds up for easy moving or traveling. Well worth the price. The canopy also is detachable (not pictured) it snaps on and off. Pretty color also.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son’s new bqby
customer_reviews.text: This item seems pretty sturdy and the zip up top is perfect to keep big sister from throwing toys into little brothers face. It will be nice to carry onto the deck and not worry about bugs biting him.
customer_reviews.author: Sunkink

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a tiny yorkie puppy
customer_reviews.text: My puppy and I both love this. I bought it because she was only a little over a lb when I got her. I like it because it zips closed so she cannot get out and it is even with the bed so if she cries I just put my hand on the netting and she goes back to sleep. When I say come lets go night night she runs to the bed room and tries to jump on it. Too cute. Anyway it is very portable
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t have asked for a better bassinet. This thing is so easy to fold and move and the zip top is so sturdy my cat can jump off the top of it without it caving in. Totally recommend. Love love love. My baby is 5 months old and still is sleeping in this it comes with the perfect thickness of mattress and fits basic Bassinet sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works great and keeps out our cats
customer_reviews.text: Got this to keep our cats from jumping in. Overall it’s sturdy and nice looking. The pad is pretty flat so I bought a lightly padded waterproof pad cover but ended up placing our dockatot in there. When our baby was having really bad reflux we were able to incline it with some large books. Only con to this is that the zipper can wake up the baby so I have to hold the zipper in such a way to muffle the noise.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who love to be on the go!
customer_reviews.text: We used this at our lake house for our daughter from 3 weeks to 3 months old. It is easy to move around the house and even allowed us to have her outside with us on the boathouse deck at night while keeping the bugs off of her! I highly recommend this to anyone with a little one! (Especially if you love to be outside when the weather is nice!)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Minton

customer_reviews.title: Used Much More Than Anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I worked so well, was so easy to transport, and we ended up using it much more than expected. Camping, traveling and day trips, visiting friends, it works for all of it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Baby hasn’t arrived yet but we have it assembled and zipped since we have cats. I did purchase a different mattress since the one it came with was super thin. We bought the grey and pink weight limit is 25 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addicted

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Our son was born two months early - so we didn’t have a baby shower. My husband and I purchased this a few weeks before our baby was able to come home. It’s perfect! We did eventually get a Halo...but I don’t have it in me to switch. He loves his bed! The canopy is perfect for families with pets and if you go on picnics or spend some time outside. It’s also great for traveling! It’s incredible for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bec Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Missing Mattress Pad!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated to open up the box and have NO bottom for the baby to lay on. I called the manufacturer and they were a joke, couldn’t even tell me when to expect a replacement part. Since the mattress pad got bad reviews ANYWAYS, I ended up spending $30 on the Oshi mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: It came in a timely manner. I’m using this in my living room because my bedside bassinet doesn’t have wheels. It would be awesome if this one did. It was a very easy assembly. Also the Halo bassinet sheets fit this thin mattress perfectly. I can’t wait to put my baby in this bassinet. I also like that there is a mesh cover on the bassinet so I can bring it outside as well. Ready for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It's safe, strong and the design and colour is great, just as in the picture. I've been using it for 2mths now and I have about 2 more months with it because my baby will be too big for it by then. If I had to say something to improve would be that it could be a little taller for my bed. I bought this only because my bedroom is not big enough for my crib.
customer_reviews.author: Kada

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bassinet
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bassinet so much! Got it about a month before my daughter was born. Read the comments and ended up buying the pink and gray version. It holds up to 25 pounds. The pink/gray and blue/gray versions hold up to 25lbs while the other colors only hold up to 10lbs. Hope that helps some other parents that are looking!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pecoraro

customer_reviews.title: High quality and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my sister-in-law. She wanted a bassinet that was lightweight, simple and easy to put together. This bassist checked all of those boxes. I also liked the price and simple design. It looks and feels like an expensive bassinet but is super affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Murakami

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and nice even if you go outside. My one month old fits perfectly and the carrier underneath makes a great storage place for diapers and wipes. All in all a great bassinet worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Evonne Christensen

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love how light it is yet it’s still sturdy ! I have a cat AND a baby, this thing is enduring them both . My baby is now 9 months and he still fits and he’s a tall baby!!! You can also zip the crib up which has been invaluable since my baby is now way too mobile yet quite unaware of any surrounding dangers . This crib has put a mom at ease . I would definitely buy it again .
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept, got this to keep cats out of the baby area and I had hoped to keep it by the bed (which is standard height) but immediately I realized it was too short for me to comfortably reach in while lying in bed. Also the zipper on the tent part was very hard to zip shut. I ended up just reselling it online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble. It is sturdy, but light weight, so will be easy to take from the basement to the main level. Also, the mattress is fine. I debated on ordering a 2" thick mattress at the time, now I'm really glad I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Diehlhill

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, sturdy, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is exactly what we were looking for. It is well made, reasonably priced, and portable. We often take our baby outside during the summer and let her nap beneath the trees in our backyard. She loves it and sleeps extra well out there. it is easy to setup and folds up for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep our cat out from baby's space; she was able to sit on top of the closed netted area without it caving in. The only issue I had with this product is the bassinet bed is very thin and hard (not firm, hard as in uncomfortable) and from what I could see it was not removable. I knew this before purchasing and gave it a chance anyway. I placed our Snuggle Nest inside the bassinet and it fit perfectly and baby was able to use it until she started to roll over.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Owens

customer_reviews.title: Buy This; Don’t Hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: This really is the best bassinet for practical every day family use. We bought this for our second child, and it’s been awesome. It’s the perfect size to go right next to our bed at night. It’s lightweight and we can easily carry up it and down the stairs for naps (even with me having a C-section). It’s great to fold up and take in the car. We’ve even enjoyed it in the summertime having the mesh dome feature and take it outside knowing that the baby will be protected while napping. It’s not the fanciest bassinet, but honestly for practical every day use it’s been great. Sometimes the simplest products are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about a month and then one of the supports pierced through the fabric and the net lost structural integrity. Couldn't get the support back into the cloth once it pierced through. Wouldn't recommend as default bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Reed

customer_reviews.title: My best friend
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I am so glad I bought it. This is worth the money! I have no complaints or suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Sally no ally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a household with cats and a new baby
customer_reviews.text: We just had our first child, and we have four cats at home. Wasnt sure how the cats would respond to the new baby, so we needed a bassinet that would keep him comfortable and secure. This was the perfect choice for us. Lightweight but sturdy. The cats can get in it when we are sleeping. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Kiesling

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet for Keeping Cat & Baby Separate
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bassinet. Perfect for keeping the 17lb cat away from baby. Good purchase at a reasonable price. I finally found a set of sheets that fit: TILLYOU Microfiber Floral Bassinet Sheets for Girls, 32''x16'' Flexible for Different Cradle and Bassinet Mattress, Silky Soft Breathable Cozy Baby Cradle Sheets, 2 Pack Navy & Rose Floral
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have other small children!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Light, yet sturdy. Easy to move around. My favorite part is the top! I bought this because we like to spend lots of time outside, and I thought it would be good to provide shade and keep bugs away. We have yet to take it outside, but it works amazing inside to keep little hands off your newborn! I have 6 kids, and they all love their brother, and want to touch him constantly. Now they just stare at him through the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Fabric light and airy I like that it is like a tent but her own little cubbie my granddaughter has room for her and blankets it takes 16 seconds to calmly cooly open once you have closed up. So no need to rush ( like this scared grandma did until pointed out ) easy to pack around anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Delma Mason

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color Received
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the grey bassinet for my new grandbaby, but received the blue & grey one instead. While they are ok with it & are going to keep it, simply because its too difficult to get it back into the box & return it, I was a little disappointed in the fact that they received the wrong color. They do not want to know the sex of the baby in advance, so they are ok with the color, as it's not a blue-blue, but more of an aqua.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Parks

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the mattress with one that’s waterproof and more substantial than the one included. Now that baby is getting bigger, the canopy gets in the way of getting him in and out. For the price, I’m still glad we got it but it’s definitely imperfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi C

customer_reviews.title: perfect and sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome bassinet. I purchased it for our baby that is due in August. I didn't realize how big it would be. I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rookus

customer_reviews.title: Handy bassinet
customer_reviews.text: My baby sleeps in this every night. I love the net part of it because it lets me know that mosquitos won’t bite her at night in the summer. The only thing I didn’t like was the padding. It’s not perfectly fitted and if you buy a sheet or sheet protector it makes the mattress part even smaller. But I had to improvise and my baby seems to sleep soundly in it every night while she is still small.
customer_reviews.author: Doejah

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great size, easy to put together and move around. Light blue color is a little on the teal colored side which was perfect for me as I'm having a girl but can't stand pink all over everything and definitely didn't think paying 10 more dollars for pink was worth it. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Philpot

customer_reviews.title: Great but zip top cover does not come off
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet. Keeps the baby at eye level of my bed and I have a pretty low bed. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because of the cover. I assumed the zip top cover could be taken off and then snapped back on whenever I need it. Wrong. Cover stays on it permanently. Would love the option to take it off when I’m not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Ours is 25lb or 3months
customer_reviews.text: As wonderful, practical and useful as this bassinet is, I only have two main issues.. 1. Yes, assembly is easy, however linkage part is very hard to push into place and ended up hurting my finger pretty bad.. 2. It is EXTREMLY difficult to close the zipper, some how they dont come close enough to link and the material pulls, I ended up having to loosen some of the clamps in order to get it to close, will not close any other way and cannot reattach once closed either.. other than that, very well thought out, keeps my cats out and you can take it anywhere..
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. smaller than other bassinets. Folds and unfolds super easy. Great for travel! Do wish the cover folded down a little different, it folds into the sleep area, so I suppose it could be an issue if you weren’t zipping it every use. Otherwise we love this!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great portable bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: Great product to have a portable "crib". We couldn't use the traditional crib right away and this portable bassinet made it a great solution. We have an active dog and worried about the sturdiness. Once it was set it we were please to see it was very strong. Wish it came with a more thicker mattress pad and bag to transport.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, could be taller though
customer_reviews.text: Overall I found this bassinet to be very useful. Love how lightweight it is and easy to move around the house. My newborn was sleeping in it by the first week. I do wish it was a little bit taller. As a C-section mom it was very painful to put baby in and take him out. If you are at all worried about cats around a sleeping baby this is the bassinet to buy!! I was so worried about the cats at night with the baby and the canopy has worked GREAT! Great peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

product_meta.title: Dream On Me Karley Bassinet, Grey/Pink
product_meta.description: Color:Grey and PinkLightweight, stylish and spacious- the Karley Bassinet is every new parents’ dream come true!One of its standout features is its portability. Weighing 12.4 lbs, it comes with a no-tool assembly & a lightweight aluminum frame, which allows you to move it from room to room. Thanks to a quick-folding mechanism, you can carry it outdoors without any hassle and use it there as well!You’ll never be short of space with the Karley Bassinet. It is spacious and airy and comes with an adjustable double canopy that keeps nasty bugs and curious pets at bay. Your baby’s essentials are never far away thanks to the attached large storage bag.It comes in nine beautiful finishes to blend in with any nursery theme. It is made of easy-to-clean soft and safe polyester foam fabric.It comes with a dual-sided 1-inch thick mattress pad as recommended by the ASTM/CPSC. Mattress pad dimensions are 30Lx15Wx1H inches. Bassinet dimensions are 33Lx19.5Wx37H. The height with the canopy is 37 inches, height without is 27. Recommended for newborns up to 25 lbs. It meets flame retardant requirements of CPSC, CA prop 65, Vermont Act 0085 (Bill S.81), NY Law ss 37-0701/9.
feature_bullets: Light & versatile:The Karley Bassinet is designed with a lightweight aluminum frame that allows you to move it easily from room to room. It comes with a no-tool assembly & quick-folding mechanism. Use it indoors and carry it outdoors without any hassle

Roomy interiors: With dimensions of 33Lx19.5Wx37H inches, the Karley is as spacious as they come The roomy, airy bassinet features an adjustable double canopy that keeps bugs away; there is also a large storage bag to hold your babies’ essentials

Stylish look: The Karley is made out of a soft, safe and comfortable polyester foam fabric, which is easy to clean. It is available in nine beautiful finishes, allowing it to blend in beautifully with the nursery of your dreams

Mattress included:It includes a dual-sided 1-inch thick mattress pad as recommended by the ASTM & CPSC.Mattress pad specs are 30Lx15Wx1H inches. It meets flame retardants requirement of CPSC,CA prop 65, Vermont Act 0085(Bill S.81),NY Law ss 37-0701/9

Other specs: The Karley Bassinet weighs 12.4 lbs and is recommended for newborns up to 25 lbs. The height with the canopy is 37 inches, height without is 27. The folded up dimensions are 6L x 19.5W x 32 H inches
JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,947 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
